description:
How To Domain Name Research Training is a comprehensive training course that will help anyone make the right decision regarding the purchase of a domain name. So many people struggle with this unique skill of researching a domain name and for that reason is why I put this course together. After you complete this course you will understand:

  • What a TLD stands for
  • How to do bulk domain research
  • Where to buy your domain names from
  • How to easily target the most keyword searched domain names
  • Use a FREE expired domains website
title: Learn How To Domain Name Research - Top Level Domains & More
